constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of double hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 4no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of double hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 4no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reasonable efforts have been made to check that the plans/documents submitted for the purposes of this application are consistent with the parent planning permission reference 20/02942/FUL, however, any inconsistencies would be resolved in favour of the parent permission. An Application for Approval of Details Reserved by Condition should not be used to evolve or modify the scheme in a way that is substantially different from that set out in the application.

The fee required for you planning application is £462.00, we acknowledgw the receipt of £117.00, please pay the outstanding balance of £345.00. Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website or our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002
